mapper.select: select d.dno, d.dtitle, d.dpic, d.ddate, d.dopen, max(b.bdate), d.uid from project_haru.diary as d left join project_haru.board as b on d.dno = b.dno where d.dopen = true and b.bopen = true group by d.dno order by max(b.bdate) desc;
select d.* from project_haru.diary as d left join project_haru.diary_scrap as s on d.dno = s.dno where uid = #{uid} order by s.dstime desc
mapper.insert: insert into project_haru.diary(dtitle, dpic, dopen, ddate, uid) values (#{dtitle}, #{dpic}, #{dopen}, now(), #{uid})
mapper.update: update project_haru.diary set dtitle = #{dtitle}, dpic = #{dpic}, dopen = #{dopen} where dno = #{dno}
